title: Declaration of Rights of Negro Peoples - compare

content.prompt: Which of the following later movements held ideas closest to those expressed by Garvey in the excerpt?

choices.label: A. Philip Randolph’s organizing of Black railroad workers into the Brotherhood of Sleeping Car Porters
Thurgood Marshall and the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People’s legal efforts to desegregate schools in Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka
Martin Luther King, Jr.’s, efforts to win equal rights for African Americans through nonviolent civil disobedience
Malcolm X’s Black nationalism emphasizing racial pride and economic self-sufficiency

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
